pages.text: $(li)Gravelly Mountains are a variant of the Mountains biome.$(br)$(li)They can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They are composed mostly of Gravel, Dirt and Stone.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Gravelly Mountains$() in the search box of the $(l:patchouli:perks/natures_compass)Nature's Compass$(/l).
